meanings.definition: The action of forging a copy or imitation of a document, signature, banknote, or work of art.
meanings.sent1: The forgery of the painting was discovered by the art expert.
meanings.sent2: The police arrested the criminal for committing forgery of official documents.
meanings.sent3: The forgery of the famous painting was so bad, it looked like a child's drawing.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a forgery of happiness, hiding the pain within.
meanings.sent5: The forgery of the signature was so precise, it fooled even the bank teller.
